articles.title: ICYMI: Protests interrupt awards show, Dolly Parton courts controversy and a heap of iconic casts reunite
articles.description: ICYMI, here are all the entertainment stories from recent days you might have missed in the Taylor Swift eclipse.
articles.content:
This Sunday's SAG Awards didn't just make the Oscars' best actress race considerably more interesting, with Emma Stone and Lily Gladstone now equal frontrunners, it featured a lot of reunions, too.

articles.title: AI ‘dream girls’ are coming for porn stars’ jobs
